title: A sermon preached at the parish church of Solihull in Warwickshire, December 21. 1690 On occasion of the death of Anne, the wife of the reverend and worshipful Henry Greswold; precentor of the Cathedral of Lichfield, &c. and rector of Solihull aforesaid. By John Wright Master of Arts.
author: Wright, John, 1665 or 6-1719.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for W. Crooke at the Green-Dragon without Temple-Bar,
